channel.title: interview on Max Belsky — a software developer and music lover

item.title: Software Engineer Behavioral Interview Questions
item.description: A list of questions to prepare for a behavioral interview: What were some of the best things you’ve built? What are you proud of? Tell me about a project that failed and what you learned from the experience. What were some excellent collaborations you’ve had? Tell me about a time when you advocated for and pushed your own ideas forward despite opposition? How do you deal with conflict? How do you like to give and receive feedback?
